effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.black_white: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.black_white: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
